channel.title: ☆ Skywars ☆ - 1.8.1 Beta Faction Based Warfare
channel.description:
[center][center]Skywars is set up using the skylands map, and seperated into four factions; fire, ice, desert, and forest. Each region has it's pros and cons, and there will be 3 tiers of each faction, basic, warrior, and lord. The lord can promote and demote members of it's faction, while the admin and mod allow people to join the faction that they are accepted into. Any faction can attack each other and try to steal resources, or destroy buildings. There is also the choice of going to the village and trading with other factions for resources, instead of attacking.
Some of the pros and cons of each area:
[size=12pt]Forest:[/size] - lots of materials and food - easily get lost
[size=12pt]Fire:[/size] - lots of diamond and a fortified base - Far away from other factions
[size=12pt]Ice:[/size] - plenty of food and materials - farthest away from mainland
[size=12pt]Desert:[/size] - has access to rail going directly to two factions and village - lots of coal and gold - no animals spawn; have to trade for food
This server uses CraftBukkit with permissions support. the Factions plugin is not used, but we have our own set up in place.
No Whitelist
[size=14pt]server log in is skywars.dyndns.info:60000[/size]
[size=12pt]A few basic rules:[/size] 1. The village and spleef arena are neutral areas, no killing. 2. If you're outside of a neutral area, you are allowed to fight 3. No fighting teammates
[size=14pt]The four faction main bases:[/size]
[size=12pt]Desert:[/size] note: it is now made of sandstone instead of obsidian [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vKZ2M.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Ice:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RL6XD.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Fire:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7m1Cy.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Forest:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SZ8Df.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]The village where you can trade:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OGZeO.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]NEW! Spleef Arena![/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zAeSc.png[/img]
like us on facebook! [url=http://"http://www.facebook.com/pages/Skywars/269899719706332"]Skywars on Facebook[/url]
We're always trying to make the server better - please donate!
[url=http://"https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=ARVS6C8BGGS3Y&lc=US&item_name=Skywars%20Server¤cy_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted"][img]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/img][/url]
We will be adding donation incentives soon, such as access to arrowwall, mob spawning, and a few others.[/center][/center]

item.title: ☆ Skywars ☆ - 1.8.1 Beta Faction Based Warfare
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Demon6994:

It’s not illegal if it’s out to the public. And it’s not illegal if i’m not distributing it. AND I didn’t crack it. So. Thus i’m not doing anything illegal.

Are you mentally challenged? That’s like saying using a gun to kill random people is not illegal because you didn’t distribute it on the black market.

Read full topic

It’s not illegal if it’s out to the public. And it’s not illegal if i’m not distributing it. AND I didn’t crack it. So. Thus i’m not doing anything illegal.

item.dc:creator: @Blarg785 Blarg785
item.description:
@Blarg785 wrote:

[center][center]Skywars is set up using the skylands map, and seperated into four factions; fire, ice, desert, and forest.
Each region has it’s pros and cons, and there will be 3 tiers of each faction, basic, warrior, and lord. The lord can promote and demote members of it’s faction, while the admin and mod allow people to join the faction that they are accepted into. Any faction can attack each other and try to steal resources, or destroy buildings. There is also the choice of going to the village and trading with other factions for resources, instead of attacking.

Some of the pros and cons of each area:

[size=12pt]Forest:[/size]

  • lots of materials and food
  • easily get lost

[size=12pt]Fire:[/size]

  • lots of diamond and a fortified base
  • Far away from other factions

[size=12pt]Ice:[/size]

  • plenty of food and materials
  • farthest away from mainland

[size=12pt]Desert:[/size]

  • has access to rail going directly to two factions and village
  • lots of coal and gold
  • no animals spawn; have to trade for food

This server uses CraftBukkit with permissions support.
the Factions plugin is not used, but we have our own set up in place.

No Whitelist

[size=14pt]server log in is skywars.dyndns.info:60000[/size]

[size=12pt]A few basic rules:[/size]

  1. The village and spleef arena are neutral areas, no killing.
  2. If you’re outside of a neutral area, you are allowed to fight
  3. No fighting teammates

[size=14pt]The four faction main bases:[/size]

[size=12pt]Desert:[/size]
note: it is now made of sandstone instead of obsidian
